about_the_game:
Metal Treasure Hunt Simulator

Step into a world where the winds of a fierce sandstorm have erased all but the remnants of a once-thriving city. You are the lone survivor, armed with only a metal detector and a trusty shovel, ready to unearth the forgotten treasures that lie beneath the shifting sands. The fate of this desolate place rests in your hands, and with every dig, you uncover not just valuable artifacts but the potential to rebuild a shattered world.

Venture down deserted streets, where ancient relics and long-forgotten riches wait to be rediscovered. From rusty coins to mysterious, long-lost artifacts, each treasure holds the key to restoring the city's forgotten glory. Sell your findings to gather the funds needed to breathe new life into crumbling structures, repair broken roads, and reawaken a thriving community.

Every day brings new challenges—new treasures to uncover, new decisions to make, and new ways to turn the ruins into something beautiful again. Will you rebuild the city piece by piece, or will it remain a desert ghost town?

Game Features:

  • A Rich, Immersive World: Dive into a sun-drenched desert landscape where every corner hides a story waiting to be uncovered.

  • Thrilling Treasure Hunts: Use your metal detector to locate hidden treasures, then dig through the sands to reveal unique artifacts and relics.

  • Rebuild and Restore: Invest your findings into the city's future—repair homes, restore vital infrastructure, and watch the city come back to life.

  • Dynamic City Evolution: Experience the satisfaction of seeing the city transform from desolate ruins to a vibrant hub of life, all thanks to your hard work and ingenuity.

Are you ready to take on the challenge? Unearth the past, rebuild the future, and become the hero this forgotten city desperately needs!
